sentences.en: 'If you are one of the unfortunate people who frown or squint while they are concentrating at the screen then, over time, you will inevitably end up with frown lines,' Dr Prager, 42, said.
sentences.cn: 42岁的普拉杰医生说：“如果你在电脑前专心工作时常常蹙眉或眯眼斜视的话，那么很不幸，长此以往，你的面部将不可避免地出现皱纹。”

sentences.en: A pro does not squint at his charts.
sentences.cn: 专业交易者不会随便看自己的图形.

sentences.en: A squint can sometimes be corrected by an eyepatch.
sentences.cn: 斜视有时候可以通过戴眼罩来纠正.

sentences.en: Aiming at the interferometric phase wrapping in squint model, a novel interferometric inverse synthetic aperture radar(ISAR) imaging algorithm based on dominant scatterers is proposed.
sentences.cn: 针对雷达在斜视工作下的干涉相位模糊问题，提出了一种新的特显点干涉逆合成孔径雷达（ISAR）成像算法。

sentences.en: Anna squinted in the sudden bright sunlight.
sentences.cn: 太阳光突然变强，安娜眯起了眼睛。

sentences.en: Clint Eastwood's trademark is his squint.
sentences.cn: (西部片影星)克林伊斯威特的特征是他眯眯眼.

sentences.en: Come here till I get a good squint at you.
sentences.cn: 过来让我好好看看你.

sentences.en: DVD may have other types of squint at the same time.
sentences.cn: DVD可与任何类型的斜视同时存在.

sentences.en: Have / Take a squint at this.
sentences.cn: 你看看这个吧.

sentences.en: He also seems to be slightly blinded by the sun, causing him to squint.
sentences.cn: 他似乎也被强烈的太阳光照的有点睁不开眼睛，导致有点斜视的样子。

sentences.en: He has a bad squint.
sentences.cn: 他患有严重的斜视.

sentences.en: He takes a squint at the weather and heaves a deep sigh.
sentences.cn: 他斜眼看看天气如何,深深叹了口气.

sentences.en: He was born with a squint.
sentences.cn: 他先天斜视.

sentences.en: He was hollow - chested, squint - eyed, and rather shambling, but spry enough withal.
sentences.cn: 他胸膛低陷, 眼睛斜视, 步履蹒跚, 但又着实生气勃勃.

sentences.en: His speech shows a squint to your view.
sentences.cn: 他的演说表现出倾向于你的看法.

sentences.en: If I squint with all my strength I may see it.
sentences.cn: 如果我斜视与我所有的力量我可以看到它。

sentences.en: Let me have a squint at it.
sentences.cn: 让我看一看.

sentences.en: The bad light caused the guests to squint their eyes.
sentences.cn: 这地方光线不好,客人们只好斜着眼睛看.

sentences.en: The bottle - top has been screwed on squint.
sentences.cn: 瓶盖儿已经被拧歪了.

sentences.en: The bright sunlight made me squint.
sentences.cn: 强烈的阳光刺得我眯起了眼。

trans.tran_en: a condition of your eye muscles that makes each eye look in a slightly different direction

trans.tran_cn: 斜视，斜着眼睛看，倾向，瞇着眼睛看
trans.tran_en: to have each eye looking in a slightly different direction
to look at something with your eyes partly closed in order to see better
